name: Jack Rugile
title: Front End Web & Game Developer
description: Front end web and game developer with 10+ years experience ranging from small creative studios to large corporations. Taking pride in my work to leave the web better than I found it.
aboutDescription: I’m a front end web and game developer with 10+ years experience ranging from small creative studios to large corporations. My ambition is to create interactive experiences that bring people joy and solve problems. I take pride in my work and want to leave the web better than I found it. I’m looking to collaborate with a team of innovative professionals who are dedicated to their craft.
footerDescription: Hey, I'm Jack! I was raised in Basalt, CO, started my career in Denver, CO, and am currently developing in Palm Bay, FL. You’ll likely find me hanging out with my family and our goofy dogs, Zoey and Juni. In my free time, I love to play Overwatch and compete in game jams.

projects.title: 3D Particle Explorations
projects.subtitle: Codrops Playground Article
projects.description: An article with demos showing the power of 3D particles. Great for loader animations, backgrounds, and transitions. Built with Three.js.

image.alt: Screenshot of the 3D Particle Explorations demo, white particle dots on a colorful 3D plane.

projects.title: Carousel Lock Interface
projects.subtitle: Sliding Combination Lock
projects.description: Use the sliding carousels to enter the super secret code. Built with Flickity.

image.alt: Screenshot of Carousel Lock Interface demo.

projects.title: Hikup
projects.subtitle: Digital Utility Web App
projects.description: A web app to encourage people to be mindful of unwanted jargon and improve how we use language in our everyday conversations. Built with Vue.js, Nuxt, and the Web Speech API.

image.alt: Screenshot of Hikup website homepage.

projects.title: If This Then Dominos
projects.subtitle: Dominos + IFTTT Automatic Order Triggers
projects.description: A microsite featuring the many ways you can automatically order Dominos based on event triggers. Built with Vue.js and GSAP. Oct 6, 2018 FWA of the Day.

links.label: View Project
links.ariaLabel: View If This Then Dominos Project

image.alt: Screenshot of If This Then Dominos project, illustrated cards showing different ways to trigger a pizza delivery.

projects.title: Inspect Interview
projects.subtitle: Discussion with Kyle Coberly
projects.description: A casual discussion about software, music, and games with Kyle Coberly. Learn about how it all started and why I do what I  do.

links.label: Read Interview
links.ariaLabel: Read Inspect Interview with Jack Rugile and Kyle Coberly

image.alt: Photo of Jack Rugile wearing a scooter helmet with the word "Inspect" overlayed on top.

projects.title: Itch A Skitch
projects.subtitle: Canvas Powered Etch A Sketch
projects.description: A recreation of the famous Etch A Sketch, right in the browser. Use your keyboard to make some art and download an image file. Built with 2D canvas.

links.label: View Source Code
links.ariaLabel: View Itch A Skitch Source Code

image.alt: Screenshot of Itch A Skitch project with controls, resembling a classic Etch A Sketch toy.

projects.title: jRumble
projects.subtitle: Element Rumbling jQuery Plugin
projects.description: A jQuery plugin that rumbles, vibrates, shakes, and rotates elements. A prominent way of directing attention to a specific part of the UI.

image.alt: Screenshot of jRumble website demo and documentation.

projects.title: Lost Without You
projects.subtitle: Turn-Based Action Puzzler
projects.description: Help two friends find each other in the dark before they run out of light. Alternate between each friend to navigate through the darkness in a mysterious labyrinth. Received 29<sup>th</sup> place in LD41. Built with Three.js.

links.label: Watch Development Timelapse
links.ariaLabel: Watch Lost Without You Development Timelapse

links.label: View Source Code
links.ariaLabel: View Lost Without You Source Code

image.alt: Screenshot of Lost Without You gameplay.

projects.title: Mission Bell
projects.subtitle: Architectural Woodwork and Casework Subcontractor
projects.description: A portfolio website featuring the work, people, and services of a custom architectural woodwork company. Built with Vue.js, Nuxt, and Sanity.

image.alt: Screenshot of Mission Bell project homepage, featuring the Nvidia Treehouse.

projects.title: Mono Move
projects.subtitle: Single Control Gravity Switching
projects.description: Play to the end with as few deaths as possible in this single control, gravity switching, rage inducing, death tallying obstacle course. Featured at Denver Creative Tech meetup. Built with 2D canvas.

image.alt: Screenshot of Mono Move gameplay.

projects.title: New Belgium Brewing Tour
projects.subtitle: 360° Photo Tour
projects.description: An interactive 360° photo tour of two New Belgium Brewing locations. Built with Vue.js, Nuxt, and Three.js.

links.label: View Project
links.ariaLabel: View New Belgium Brewing Tour Project

image.alt: Screenshot of New Belgium Brewing Tour website.

projects.title: Omelet Agency
projects.subtitle: Los Angeles Ad Agency
projects.description: A full website showcasing the work, people, and values of Los Angeles based ad agency, Omelet. Built with React.

image.alt: Screenshot of Omelet Agency website homepage.

projects.title: Placeholdem
projects.subtitle: Placeholder Caret Animation
projects.description: A JavaScript plugin that animates placeholder carets on inputs and textareas. The placeholder value will incrementally delete on focus, and restore on blur.

image.alt: Screenshot of Placeholdem demo.

projects.title: Radius Raid
projects.subtitle: Space Shoot ’Em Up in 13kb
projects.description: Blast away unrelenting enemies before they destroy you. Features 13 enemy types, 5 powerups, parallax backgrounds, retro sound effects, and locally stored stats. Received 1<sup>st</sup> place in js13kGames 2013. Built with 2D canvas in 13kb.

image.alt: Screenshot of Radius Raid gameplay.

projects.title: Rainbow Firestorm
projects.subtitle: Particle Simulation
projects.description: A simulation where colorful glowing particles cut through growing circles. Built with 2D canvas.

image.alt: Screenshot of Rainbow Firestorm demo.

projects.title: Ride the Magic
projects.subtitle: Boreal Mountain Snowboard Adventure
projects.description: A retro snowboarding game promoting discounted tickets to ride Boreal Mountain in Soda Springs, CA. Built with Phaser.

image.alt: Screenshot of Ride the Magic gameplay.

projects.title: Simplex Flower Generator
projects.subtitle: Three.js Mesh Lines
projects.description: A generator that uses simplex noise and variable thickness lines to create flowers with varying parameters. Built with Three.js, showcasing THREE.MeshLine.

image.alt: Screenshot of Simplex Flower Generator demo.

projects.title: SpacePi
projects.subtitle: Space Defense in 13kb
projects.description: A mouse accuracy/agility game revolving around the defense of 13 bases in the most desolate regions of space. Received 1<sup>st</sup> place in js13kGames 2012. Built with 2D canvas in 13kb.

image.alt: Screenshot of SpacePi title frame.

projects.title: Start Making Games
projects.subtitle: An Intro to Game Dev for the Web Dev
projects.description: A presentation about why games are the ultimate creative expression, how to build a simple pong game, and how to ramp it up to the next level.

links.label: View Slide Deck
links.ariaLabel: View Start Making Games Slide Deck

links.label: View Source Code
links.ariaLabel: View Start Making Games Source Code

image.alt: Screenshot of Start Making Games final pong game demo.

projects.title: TurtleRat Alley
projects.subtitle: Capital One Bowling
projects.description: Part of Capital One’s March Madness 2018 campaign featuring Charles Barkley and San Antonio, TX. Bowl an armadillo in three alleys. Built with Three.js and GSAP.

image.alt: Screenshot of TurtleRat Alley logo screen.

projects.title: VariaBoard
projects.subtitle: Parameter Control Interface
projects.description: A control interface to modify parameters in JavaScript. Useful for live tweaking settings in visual demos.

image.alt: Screenshot of VariaBoard control interface demo.

projects.title: YouTube View in 2
projects.subtitle: Trends and Content Tips for Brands
projects.description: A microsite feauring View in 2, a video series highlighting the latest YouTube trends, insights, and content tips for brands.

image.alt: Screenshot of YouTube View in 2 website homepage.
